physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 95.9 cm (SDS -3.7), Weight: 11.4 kg (SDS -3.2), Head circumference: 46.3 cm (SDS -2.7)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurological, cardiovascular, respiratory, and abdominal examinations were all normal.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 91.4 cm (SDS -4.5), Weight: 10.3 kg (SDS -3.6), Head circumference: 45.9 cm (SDS -3.2)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurological, cardiovascular, respiratory, and abdominal examinations were all normal.
Developed a mild photosensitive facial rash diagnosed as cutaneous lupus erythematosus.
Presented with difficulty swallowing, cough, and weight loss. A chest X-ray showed a mediastinal mass.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Underlying condition progressed to a diagnosis of B cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Developed a photosensitive facial rash diagnosed as hemorrhagic polymorphous light eruption.
Dysmorphic features became more prominent: hypertelorism, mild down slant, pointed nose, full lips, clinodactyly.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Dysmorphic features initially subtle became more prominent over time.
